## About 1Clipboard
1Clipboard revolutionizes productivity by transforming the standard clipboard into a powerful, persistent tool that remembers everything you copy. Unlike basic clipboard utilities that only store the last copied item, 1Clipboard maintains a comprehensive history of all your clipboard activity, including text snippets, images, and file references. The application operates discreetly in the background, automatically capturing clipboard content while providing quick access through intuitive keyboard shortcuts and a clean, organized interface.

The desktop application delivers a consistent and reliable experience across both macOS and Windows platforms, featuring cloud synchronization that ensures your clipboard history remains accessible across all your workstations. 1Clipboard's intelligent organization system allows users to favorite important clips, create custom categories, and quickly retrieve frequently used content without interrupting their workflow. With its focus on privacy and local processing of sensitive data, 1Clipboard provides the convenience of persistent clipboard management while maintaining the security standards required for professional and personal use.

## âš™ï¸ System Requirements

**For macOS:**
*   macOS Monterey 12.0 or later
*   64-bit processor
*   2 GB RAM (4 GB recommended)
*   200 MB of available storage space

**For Windows:**
*   Windows 10 (64-bit) or later
*   2 GB RAM (4 GB recommended)
*   DirectX 11 compatible graphics card
*   200 MB of available storage space
